summary: "Ready Player One" is a 2018 sci-fi action movie directed by Steven Spielberg, based on Ernest Cline's book. Set in 2045, most people use a virtual world called OASIS to escape reality. A teen orphan discovers a contest that offers control of OASIS to the winner. He teams up with friends to beat an evil corporation. The film is full of pop culture references and received positive reviews for its effects and fast pace. It made over $600 million worldwide and is getting a sequel.
title: Ready Player One (film)
